LanguageData.Miho_Turret_Machinegun.label: Miho Heavy Machine Gun
LanguageData.Miho_Turret_Machinegun.description: A heavy machine gun turret that uses 7.7mm ammunition. It has moderate optics, making it superior to the machine gun for mechanoids.
LanguageData.Miho_BuildingWeapon_Machinegun.label: Miho Heavy Machine Gun
LanguageData.Miho_Turret_Missile.label: Miho Medium-MAT
LanguageData.Miho_BuildingWeapon_Missile.label: Medium-MAT
LanguageData.Miho_Missile.label: Miho Guided Incendiary Missile
LanguageData.Miho_Missile.description: A guided missile used by the Medium-MAT for any situation. It has a collateral shrapnel effect.
LanguageData.Miho_MissilePlasma.label: Miho Guided Plasma Missile
LanguageData.Miho_MissilePlasma.description: A guided plasma missile used by the Medium-MAT for fending off mechanoids. The heavy plasma warhead packs a devastating anti-mech firepower.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleRecoillessSharp.label: Miho Recoilless Artillery
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleRecoillessSharp.descrip: A recoilless gun that can fire unguided Miho missiles. Due to its old firing mechanism it can not fire plasma missiles.
